name: Crescent (Andrea Schöniger, Francisco Carrasco Girbés, Agus12, ClaudiaSchoniger)
name_original: Crescent (Andrea Schöniger, Francisco Carrasco Girbés, Agus12, ClaudiaSchoniger)
description:
I have been told many stories of the living and all of them have one thing in common. In order to eat you have to be hungry; In order to live you have to know death.

Global Game Jam 2022
